name: Highrise (itch) (LunarCole)
description:
A VR Unity Game made in a team of 4 and my diploma project where I explore ways to optimize performance! In it you have to find different objects, solve small puzzles, defend yourself against drones and keep the upload (ingame) running

Platform: Oculus Rift / HTC Vive

Controls: Oculus Rift / HTC Vive Controllers

Language: English

Team:

  • Collin K. - Programming & working in Unity
  • Leo L. - Game Design & VR Interactions
  • Monika G. - Modeling & Texturing
  • Viktoria F. - Modeling & Texturing
